Options_ToggleKey_Tooltip: The key used to toggle nametags
Options_TextColor_Tooltip: The hexadecimal color of the foreground text
Options_BackgroundColor_Tooltip: The hexadecimal color of the background box
Options_BackgroundOpacity_Tooltip: The level of 'see-through' for the background box
Options_AlsoApplyOpacityToText_Tooltip: Whether or not to apply the background opacity to the text
